remarks: Extension of a function with a new ordered pair.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Sep-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
statement:
fnunop.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. _V ) $.
fnunop.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. _V ) $.
fnunop.f $e |- ( ph -> F Fn D ) $.
fnunop.g $e |- G = ( F u. { <. X , Y >. } ) $.
fnunop.e $e |- E = ( D u. { X } ) $.
fnunop.d $e |- ( ph -> -. X e. D ) $.
fnunsn $p |- ( ph -> G Fn E ) $.
